(Kinger's Character Death was trying to drive a spear into Hell Beast, just=
 so you know.)

::Jynx/Four Nightmares::

    Jynx brought the Nightmares n=
ew weapons. They were "Smart" Guns. They would autoaim for center mass on a=
 bot without the Destron signature and fire mutliple energy pulses, it woul=
d also follow the bot until it couldn't hit it without going through someth=
ing. The guns could fire about 1,000 shots before being recharged.
    The =
Nightmares took these and went after the bots that attacked them. Black Ara=
chnia was one, Gremlin, and Hell Beast. Hell Beast Had two Nightmares attac=
king him and BA and Gremlin only had one.
